Question: A grotesque of this person looms over the east face of the Washington National Cathedral's northwest tower.
Hints: This person kills Obi-Wan in a lightsaber duel and escapes the Death Star's destruction during the film's climactic battle scene.
Anakin battled Kenobi on the site of a volcano and was badly wounded, but was then reborn as this person.
Desperate to save his wife, Anakin pledges himself as Sith apprentice this person.
